patterns: What is Gen Garage
About Gen Garage
Gen Garage
When was Gen Garage founded?
Where was Gen Garage founded?
Who founded Gen Garage?
responses: Gen Garage was founded in Mumbai in 2019. It is an innovative platform that brings together fresh graduates, interns, mentors, and industry leaders.

patterns: Gen Z
What is Gen Z Campus?
About Gen Z Campus
Gen Z Campus
responses: Gen Z Campus is a learning Initiative for Grade A in collaboration with I&D Gen Z Arena. The transformation program for grade A includes: 1. Immersive learning opportunities: The campus offers a series of essential self-paced learnings covering technical skills to developing leadership acumen. 2. Mentorship and guidance: Subject matter experts from various business lines will be available to mentor the young associates through-out their journey, offering valuable insights and constructive feedback. 3. Innovators space: The campus, in collaboration with the Gen Garage, also offers a dedicated space for brainstorming and creating solutions to real-world challenges faced by our clients. To visit Gen Z Campus site and Learn, Click on the given link below: Gen Z Campus

responses: Gen Garage has a global presence, operating Pan India with major presence in cities such as Bangalore, Mumbai, Pune, Chennai, Hyderabad, Kolkata, and Delhi NCR.

patterns: Projects

Projects included in Gen Garage
responses:
1.Business challenges
2.Proof of concepts (POCs)
3.Innovative ideas focused on value addition
4.Use cases revolving around ESG (Environmental, Social, and Governance) applications.

patterns: When Gen Garage started
responses: Previously known as Millennial Garage, it was founded in Mumbai in 2019. The new version called 'Gen Garage' with a federated model was launched in 2023.

Social Media Champs 4. Escape Club 5. Magic Pen 6. Falcon club Gen Garage Clubs Registration Form: Gen Garage Clubs

patterns: Working Hours
What is the Office / Work from Home hours for anyone in Gen Garage account
responses: The timings for anyone in Gen Garage are from 9 AM to 6:30 PM.

patterns: Till when one will be a part of Gen Garage
responses: One will be a part of Gen Garage until he/she gets a billing project.

patterns: Why it is necessary to join the sessions conducted by Gen Garage
responses: Because these sessions are conducted extensively for GenZs to gain knowledge about innovative technologies.

patterns: Gen Garage Sessions or Projects, which to prioritize
responses: Since you are a part of Gen Garage, it is your responsibility to give priority to Gen Garage sessions along with your project works.
